name: Type graph query 1
description: Type with graph query returning a scalar
resolved:
MATCH (getAirport_Airport:airport{code:'SEA'})
OPTIONAL MATCH (getAirport_Airport)-[getAirport_Airport_outboundRoutesCount_r:route]->(getAirport_Airport_outboundRoutesCount_a)
WITH getAirport_Airport, count(getAirport_Airport_outboundRoutesCount_r) AS getAirport_Airport_outboundRoutesCount
RETURN {outboundRoutesCount:getAirport_Airport_outboundRoutesCount} LIMIT 1
